structure.unit: STRAYS AND ANIMALS RUNNING AT LARGE

law.history: Repealed 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 20, sec. 6. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 4645m-1, 4645m-4, 4645m-7.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: County, justice's district or precinct may prohibit cattle from running at large.
